actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 to add Methyl Ethyl Ketone as a listed essential chemical, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 to include methyl ethyl ketone as a listed essential chemical (i.e., a chemical specified by regulation of the Attorney General as one used as a solvent, reagent, or catalyst in manufacturing a controlled substance in violation of such Act).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 to add Methyl Ethyl Ketone as a listed essential chemical, and for other purposes.
